alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 5:50AM CST until February 25 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yalobusha At Whaley affecting Leflore and Carroll Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yalobusha At Whaley. * WHEN...From early this morning to Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Minor flooding of lowland and agricultural land is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 20.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.5 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Yalobusha Whaley 21.0 20.8 Wed 5 am CST 22.3 20.1 18.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM CST.
